posts.post_content:
Hi all. I am looking for a T206 American Beauty 460 Herzog. I just missed out on one on Ebay and if anyone has one for sale or for trade, please let me know. Thanks.

Derek
There's a Geyer on Ebay. I know you're looking for the Herzog though.

Thank you for the tip. I saw the Geyer. Solid looking card. I just want the Herzog for now, as I love the sweater and friendly smile! I just lost out on one on Ebay.

Also, if anyone has these cards in AB 460 or Cycle 460 that would be cool.

Herzog
Pfeister - throwing
overall - blue sky
stienfeldt - with bat

thanks!
I'll keep an eye out for you.
I appreciate that. Thank you. I will pay cash or trade. Either way. Much appreciated.
